__e: Of course, it's easy for me to say. I'm a white man reaping all the glorious benefits of a system skewed in my favor.
I want my baby to have all the benefits of a strong, present father.
I'm calling because, all assurances to the contrary,
Now he knows you got what he wants, he could be seeing the benefits of working together.
Would any of you-- whom I've never met prior to this engagement-- be interested in coming up onstage and sharing the benefits of your lifestyle?
Yeah, they gave $40,000 and agreed to cover my health and life insurance benefits for the rest of my life, which seemed to be a few months away.
It's all the benefits of nature without having to actually sleep on the ground.
Anyway... it's too bad you're no longer entitled to the full benefits of my friendship, because I happen to be extremely prepared for such an emergency.
Stevie, have you thought this through?
I can get all the benefits I want, any time I want from any friend too.
Your friend over there does not have the benefit of your position.
There will be no benefit to your people.
We had a... partners with benefits sort of thing.
It's time someone used it for the benefit of my people.
